name: Brian Jud
seeking: Seeks JV partners who work with authors, publishers, or aspiring writers who need book marketing and non-traditional distribution support. Would benefit from partnerships with writing coaches, self-publishing platforms, or literary associations whose members are actively trying to sell more books. Collaboration with content creators or media companies who reach entrepreneurial authors would expand reach into the target market.
who_you_serve: Authors, publishers, and entrepreneurs seeking book marketing strategies and distribution expertise.
audience_type: Authors, publishers, and entrepreneurs seeking book marketing strategies and distribution expertise.
social_proof: The New York Times called us "Dial-an-Expert." Featured twice in the New Yorker's Talk of the Town. Clients included The White House, Disney, Exxon, US Olympic Committee & the CIA. Tens of thousands of copies of the printed Yearbook of Experts requested by journalists -- including Walter Cronkite.
